researcherInfoSys

Class TopicModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • researcherInfoSys.TopicModel

  • public class TopicModel
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class to implement Probabilistic Topic Model and recommend similar researchers to a specified researcher.
    Author:
    james

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  TopicModel.RecommendResult
      An inner class which mainly stores the recommended researchers list and indicator value of each researcher.

    • Field Detail

      • topicDistribution

        private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,double[]> topicDistribution
        Map between the instance name to the distribution of each topic of this instance.

      • interestDistribution

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double>> interestDistribution
        List of different topics' distributions of interests. Each element of the list maps from each related interest name under this topic to the probabilistic value of this interest.

      • instancesList

        private cc.mallet.types.InstanceList instancesList
        List of all instances read from data file.

      • dataAlphabet

        private cc.mallet.types.Alphabet dataAlphabet
        DataAlphabet of all instances, used to map each index of the interest to its name.

      • model

        private cc.mallet.topics.ParallelTopicModel model
        Instance of the Topic Model.

      • topicSortedInterests

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.util.TreeSet<cc.mallet.types.IDSorter>> topicSortedInterests
        An array of sorted interests under each topic.

      • topicsNum

        private final int topicsNum
        The number of topicsNum assigned.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TopicModel

        public TopicModel(int topicsNum)
        Constructor with parameter, constructing a new TopicModel instance with the number of topics. build up the topic model using the data from text file, and organize the result into topicDistribution, interestDistribution for further processing.
        Parameters:
        topicsNum - the assigned topics number

    • Method Detail

      • getTopicDistribution

        public double[] getTopicDistribution(java.lang.String name,
                                     int id,
                                     boolean print)
        Get the topic distribution of a specified instance, providing its researcher name and researcher id, and print the distribution if required.
        Parameters:
        name - the researcher name of a instance
        id - the researcher id number of a instance
        print - is true if choose to print out the topic distributuin
        Returns:
        the topic distribution of a specified instance

      • getTopicDistribution

        public double[] getTopicDistribution(java.lang.String instanceName,
                                     boolean print)
        Get the topic distribution of a specified instance, providing its instanceName and print the distribution if required.
        Parameters:
        instanceName - the name of a instance, which is a combination of researcher name and id
        print - is true if choose to print out the topic distribution
        Returns:
        the topic distribution of a specified instance

      • getHottestInterest

        private java.lang.String getHottestInterest(int topicIndex)
        Get the hottest 10 interests under a specified topic, providing the topic index.
        Parameters:
        topicIndex - the index of a topic
        Returns:
        the top 10 interests under one topic, as a String

        private static java.lang.String toInstanceName(java.lang.String name,
                                               int id)
        Convert the name and id of a researcher to the instance name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of a researcher
        id - the id number of a researcher
        Returns:
        the corresponding instance name of this researcher

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the researcher instance

      • recommend

        public void recommend(Researcher researcher)
        Recommend and print out similar researchers of a specified researcher, measure similarity using predictive conditional probability.
        Parameters:
        researcher - the specified researcher requiring recommendation.

      • recommend_KL

        public void recommend_KL(Researcher researcher)
        Recommend and print out similar researchers of a specified researcher, measure similarity using KL divergence.
        Parameters:
        researcher - the specified researcher requiring recommendation

      • recommend_Cosine

        public void recommend_Cosine(Researcher researcher)
        Recommend and print out similar researchers of a specified researcher, measure similarity using Cosine similarity.
        Parameters:
        researcher - the specified researcher requiring recommendation

      • createArff

        public Researcher[] createArff(java.lang.String fileName)
        Write the information containing in the topic model into an Arff file, in the format required by the weka API for further processing.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the path of the Arff file needed to be written data into
        Returns:
        A catalog which helps other APIs to retrieve researchers conveniently.
